title: Software Developer Intern
description:
About AL HAWA GROUP OF COMPANIES

About Al Hawa Information Technology Services Company

Al Hawa Technologies is a dynamic and forward-thinking information technology company providing a comprehensive range of professional services, including custom software development, database design and implementation, IT consulting, and technical training.

We are committed to empowering organizations of all sizes and industries by leveraging modern technologies to help them achieve their strategic and operational goals. Our team of skilled software engineers, database specialists, and technology consultants works closely with clients to understand their unique requirements and deliver high-quality, tailored solutions that exceed expectations.

At Al Hawa Technologies, we believe technology is most effective when aligned with business strategy. Therefore, in addition to development services, we offer expert consulting to optimize processes and improve efficiency. Our long-term client relationships are built on trust, transparency, and a shared commitment to success.




Job Summary

We are seeking motivatedÂ Software Developer Interns / Junior Full-Stack Developers, includingÂ final-year university students and recent graduates, to join our growing development team.

The selected candidate will participate in the design, development, testing, and maintenance of web-based applications while gaining hands-on experience in a professional, fast-paced environment.




Duties & Responsibilities

Assist in the design, development, and maintenance of web applications
Develop front-end components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Support back-end development using PHP frameworks such as Laravel or CodeIgniter
Participate in database design, implementation, and optimization
Collaborate with senior developers, designers, and project managers
Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code
Debug, test, and improve application performance and reliability
Follow software development life cycle (SDLC) best practices
Continuously learn new technologies and development tools

Job Requirements

Final-year university student or Bachelorâ€™s degree inÂ Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field


Solid understanding of full-stack development concepts and SDLC


Proficiency in front-end technologies:Â HTML, CSS, JavaScript


Familiarity with PHP back-end frameworks such asÂ LaravelÂ orÂ CodeIgniter


Strong problem-solving and analytical skills


Good communication and teamwork abilities


Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines

Submission Guideline

Interested candidates are required to apply through the link below.

Please note that applications submitted via email will not be considered.




https://alhawa.alhawaims.com/public-position-view/MTM=

title: Software Development Assistant (React Developer)
description:
About PARSA Technologies

For almost a decade, PARSA relentless innovation, quality of products, responsible management, and dedication made it the partner of choice for many of the Afghanâ€™s most trusted brands. PARSA in the local Afghanistan Market is one of the trusted partners in domains of web application development, mobile application development, value-added services, HR MIS, Finance Management System, SMS Platform, and e-commerce. We are glad to demonstrate through our work that we have the capabilities, people, processes, technology, and the desire to be the strategic technology partner of choice for many Afghan entities, including government departments, the private sector, and non-government organizations (NGOs).

PARSAâ€™s primary objective is to develop an environment of fairness, honesty, integrity, and courtesy towards our clients, employees, vendors, and society at large. We areÂ committed to our customers & partners and have a passion for technology.

Job Summary

The Software Development Assistant will work under the overall guidance of the ChiefÂ Executive Officer and under the direct supervision of the Software Development Team Head.

Duties & Responsibilities

He/she will work in close collaboration with the Software Development Department andÂ will fulfill the following duties and responsibilities:

Designing and Development of web and mobile applications.
Conducting feasibility studies for software projects.
Completing tasks such as coding, testing, and debugging.
Writing advanced programming code.
Managing project timelines and tasks.
Work in close partnership with operation, business, and management departments

V. Competencies and Critical Success Factors

Functional Competencies

Knowledge Management and Learning

Shares knowledge and experience;
Actively works towards continuing personal learning and development andÂ applies newly acquired skills.

Development and Operational Effectiveness.

Proficiency with React
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript + ES6, Sass, Tailwind CSS
Excellent understanding of React-redux, Webpack, REST API
Good knowledge of version control system like git
Good knowledge of UI and UX and Proficiency with Figma
Ability to perform a broad range of parallel specialized activitiesÂ 
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent organization and time management skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Demonstrated ability to lead others.

Leadership and Self-Management

Focuses on result for the client and responds positively to feedback;
Ability to team work.
Consistently approaches work with energy and a positive, constructive attitude; Demonstrates openness to change and ability to manage complexity.
Ability to handle daily tasks mainly in the field.
Ability to establish good working relations with a range of stakeholders.
Ability to coach, mentor, and develop people skills.
Ability to focus on results
Consistently approaches work with energy in a positive and constructive attitude.




Job Requirements

Bachelor's in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent subject
At least 3+ years of experience in the above-mentioned field

Submission Guideline

Interested individual submits their Personal CV indicating all past experience from similarÂ job, as well as the contact details (email and telephone number) of the Candidate to: hr@parsa.technology

Note: applicants are instructed toÂ write the position title in the subject lineÂ of their email when submitting their application.

title: System Administrator
description:
About Aurum Afghanistan Financial Company

Aurum Afghanistan Financial Company is a full-fledged electronic money institution regulated by the central bank of Afghanistan operating under the license No. EMI101006. In addition to our regulatory license, we are also equipped with license No. 78895 from the Ministry of industry and commerce of Afghanistan. We possess advanced technology infrastructure which enables our clients to access financial services through their mobile phones securely, quickly and conveniently. Our services are available to everyone, particularly individuals who may not have access to traditional banking services. We offer significant opportunities for improving the efficiency of digital financial services by expanding access and lowering transaction costs. We provide a customized electronic payment solution. Aurum Afghanistan facilitates digital financial transactions, which includes services such as mobile wallet to mobile wallet, bank 02 to mobile wallet, mobile wallet to bank, electricity and other utilities bill payments, merchantâ€™s payments, AfPay card services, payments through PoS machines and other prospective electronic payments services. AurumPay is a leading electronic money platform in Afghanistan, operating under the supervision of the Central Bank of Afghanistan. We empower individuals, merchants, and corporations with secure, convenient, and innovative financial solutions. Join our mission to bring digital payments to every corner of Afghanistan!

Job Summary

Job Summary

AurumPay EMI is seeking an experienced System Administrator to manage, configure, and maintain our IT infrastructure. The ideal candidate will be responsible for Oracle servers, network security using Sophos firewalls, backup management, and data center setup and operations.

Duties & Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities

Configure, install, and maintain Oracle servers and Oracle databases
Manage, configure, and monitor Sophos Firewalls
Perform regular backups of:
Servers
Oracle databases
Firewalls
Ensure backup integrity, restoration testing, and disaster recovery readiness
Plan, set up, and manage data center infrastructure
Monitor system performance, security, and availability
Troubleshoot system, network, and database-related issues
Maintain system documentation and operational procedures
Ensure compliance with security and operational best practices




Job Requirements

Required Skills & Experience

Proven experience as a System Administrator
Strong hands-on experience with Oracle Servers and Oracle Databases
Experience configuring and managing Sophos Firewalls
Solid knowledge of backup and recovery strategies
Experience with data center setup and operations
Understanding of network security, system monitoring, and disaster recovery
Strong problem-solving and documentation skills

Preferred Qualifications

Certifications related to Oracle, Linux/Windows Server
Experience in financial services or EMI environments
Knowledge of compliance and security standards







Submission Guideline

Interested male and female candidates are encouraged to submit their CV to:

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Information Comm. Technology Associate, GS6, Fixed Term, Kandahar (#19484) & Herat (#19391)
description:
About UNICEF Afghanistan

UNICEF works in some of the worldâ€™s toughest places, to reach the worldâ€™s most disadvantaged children. To save their lives. To defend their rights. To help them fulfill their potential. Across 190 countries and territories, we work for every child, everywhere, every day, to build a better world for everyone. And we never give up. For every child, Passion!

Job Summary

How can you make a difference?Â 




Purpose for the job:Â ICT/T4D Associates will assist programme teams in the identification, assessment and integration of ICT and digital innovation into UNICEF programming; strengthening internal capacity to support T4D related initiatives; identifying and engaging with key partners; building and maintaining business relationships; applying reusable and replicable technical buildings blocks; and maximizing the potential for the scale-up and sustainability of technology and digital innovation for UNICEF programming.







Duties & Responsibilities

Summary of Key function, accountabilities and related duties/tasks

ï»¿

General ICT/T4D Office Support:
T4D Portfolio Coordination
Minimal ICT Administration

If you would like to know more about this position, please review the complete Job Description here:Â JD/TOR- ICT Associate G-6




Job Requirements

To qualify as an advocate for every child you will haveâ€¦




Minimum requirements:

Education:

Completion of Secondary education is required, supplemented with formal training in Computer Science, Information Systems, Telecommunications, Engineering.

Work Experience:

A minimum of six years of practical work experience in information technology, requiring systematic methods of troubleshooting and problem solving is required.
A bachelorâ€™s degree from a recognized academic institution in a relevant field may replace three years of related work experience. A masterâ€™s degree may replace an additional two years.
ITIL Foundation Certificate or equivalent customer support certification is an asset.Â 
Experience in providing assistance to users with IT products and services, and use of applications and diagnostic tools is required.
Practical experience in providing technical and business Customer Support and Services is required.
Practical experience and working knowledge of various computer platforms and applications are required.

Language Requirements:Â 

Fluency in English is required. Knowledge of another official UN language (Arabic, Chinese, French, Russian or Spanish) or a local language is an asset.

Desirables:

Relevant experience at country level, particularly in development, fragile settings and humanitarian contexts.




Submission Guideline

Remarks:




As per Article 101, paragraph 3, of the Charter of the United Nations, the paramount consideration in the employment of the staff is the necessity of securing the highest standards of efficiency, competence, and integrity.

UNICEF is committed to fostering an inclusive, representative, and welcoming workforce. For this position, eligible and suitableÂ FemaleÂ candidatesÂ are encouraged to apply.

Vacancy announcement is open to internal and external candidates. Priority will be given to staff in abolished posts and internal staff members.

Government employees who are considered for employment with UNICEF are normally requiredÂ to resign from their government positions before taking up an assignment with UNICEF. UNICEF reserves the right to withdraw an offer of appointment, without compensation, if a visa or medical clearance is not obtained, or necessary inoculation requirements are not met, within a reasonable period for any reason.Â 

UNICEF does not charge a processing fee at any stage of its recruitment, selection, and hiring processes (i.e., application stage, interview stage, validation stage, or appointment and training). UNICEF will not ask for applicantsâ€™ bank account information.

Humanitarian action is a cross-cutting priority within UNICEFâ€™s Strategic Plan. UNICEF is committed to stay and deliver in humanitarian contexts. Therefore, all staff, at all levels across all functional areas, can be called upon to be deployed to support humanitarian response, contributing to both strengthening resilience of communities and capacity of national authorities.

All UNICEF positions are advertised, and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted and advance to the next stage of the selection process. An internal candidate performing at the level of the post in the relevant functional area, or an internal/external candidate in the corresponding Talent Group, may be selected, if suitable for the post, without assessment of other candidates.

Candidates who have applied previously do not need to reapply.




Additional information about working for UNICEF can be foundÂ here.




Applicants are requested to apply through the provided link; Vacancies | UNICEF Careers




Applications received via JOBS.AF online portal will not be given consideration.

title: HMIS Data Assistance
description:
About MAGNA

MAGNAÂ is a medical humanitarian organization that has been actively working worldwide and providing humanitarian aid for more than 20 years. Now our projects cover about 15 countries. The largest programs are deployed inÂ Congo (DR), Syria, South Sudan, Iraq, Afghanistan and Ukraine. We implement our humanitarian aid projects by working directly with the medical institutions and supporting doctors provided direct emergency medical care to patients who need it.




MAGNAÂ operates internationally and provides assistance to children and their families in need, including victims of natural disasters, wars and conflicts. In the field we maintain doctors and medical staff but also technical and other specialists, providing humanitarian assistance and help to treat children and their families.




MAGNAÂ focusing onÂ Health, Nutrition and MHPSSÂ projects, primarily aimed at saving lives and alleviating the suffering of those in need. Armed conflicts and unstable political situations have a devastating impact on ordinary people. Consequences, often associated with inadequate local health services, commonly include direct violence, forced displacement, epidemics, famine, and psychological trauma. Providing medical assistance to victims of conflicts and crises is MAGNA workersâ€™ top priority. Alleviating suffering from infectious diseases neglected by local structures is another major area of MAGNAâ€™s focus.




MAGNA has a zero tolerance policy with regard to Sexual Exploitation and Abuse by MAGNAâ€™s personnel against the people they serve. Protection from Sexual Exploitation and Abuse (PSEA) is the responsibility of everyone and all selected candidates will be required to comply with MAGNAâ€™s PSEA Policy at all times. Selected candidates will therefore undergo rigorous reference and background checks against their past behavior related to sexual exploitation and abuse, and may be required to provide additional information further on in the selection process.

Job Summary

Defining, coordinating and monitoring all data related activities including data collection, analysis, reporting, monitoring and evaluation processes according toÂ MAGNAÂ protocols, standards and procedures in order to ensure quality medical care for patients and their communities and to improve the health condition of the population

Duties & Responsibilities

Accountabilities:

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Data Entry and Monitoring, assist with daily data entry tasks for the health facilities (clinics, hospitals, health centers) and support the establishment of monitoring tools for data collection processes.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Data Verification, ensure that all collected data is accurate, consistent, and aligned with the project's indicators. Perform regular checks to ensure the quality and completeness of data.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Technical Assistance, provide technical support and guidance to the health care providers and data entry team on how to use HMIS tools for data entry. Help resolve issues related to data collection.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Data Analysis Support, assist in analyzing collected data to identify trends, gaps, and key performance indicators (KPIs). Support the review and assessment of data to ensure project targets are being met.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Reporting and Feedback, assist in the preparation of monthly and quarterly reports on analyzed data. Provide feedback to the health facilities on the status of their data quality and suggest areas for improvement.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Capacity Building Support, assist in identifying and addressing training needs for the health facilities' staff related to HMIS. Participate in on-the-job training sessions to improve skills in data entry, quality control, and analysis.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â HR Coordination, support the HR department in monitoring the training and development needs of the data entry staff. Assist in the organization of training or induction programs for new data team members.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Support Project Teams, attend regular internal meetings and training sessions, such as MAGNA's coordination meetings and trainings, to contribute to team updates and feedback. Participate in the dissemination of project-related information to the team.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Data Update and Communication, ensure that all HMIS data collection tools are updated regularly. Assist in sharing relevant updates with team members and healthcare providers to ensure consistent communication of expectations.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Report Preparation, support the preparation and submission of regular data reports to the Ministry of Health (MoPH), donors, and MAGNA. Ensure reports are accurate, complete, and submitted on time.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Team Collaboration, work closely with the medical team and health supervisors to ensure proper data collection and entry practices. Participate in collaborative team efforts to assess and improve data handling processes.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Additional Tasks, perform any other tasks assigned by the supervisor to support the success of the project, including assisting with other administrative or operational activities as needed




Context Specific Accountabilities:

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will assist with daily data entry tasks for the health facilities (clinics, hospitals, health centers) and support the establishment of monitoring tools for data collection processes.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will help review and adapt HMIS data collection tools to meet the projectâ€™s needs and indicators, under the guidance of the HMIS Manager.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will ensure that all HMIS data collection tools are updated regularly. Assist in sharing relevant updates with team members and healthcare providers to ensure consistent communication of expectations.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will ensure the regular supply of HMIS tools to the health facilities, and he will maintain the supply of HMIS tools on need based to the health facilities.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will assist in ensuring that all staff follow the HMIS Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for data collection and documentation.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will assist with the verification and validation of collected data to maintain consistency and quality at all health facility levels.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will ensure that all collected data is accurate, consistent, and aligned with the project's indicators. Perform regular checks to ensure the quality and completeness of data.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will help in analyzing key project indicators and comparing collected data with project targets to assess the performance of activities and identify areas for improvement.

-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will ensure that all patient data and sensitive information are handled with full respect and maintained confidentially in accordance with privacy guidelines.

He will perform any other tasks assigned by the supervisor to support the success of the project, including assisting with other administrative or operational activities as needed

Job Requirements

Education

MD/ Nursing degree from recognized institute




Experience

At least 2 years of experience in HMIS and Data entry.

Â 

Submission Guideline

Interested and Qualified applicants can send their application and CV to the following email:

personal-adm-mng@af.magna.org

No other type of submission will be accepted.




Please mention the vacancy number and position name in the subject line of the email. Otherwise, you will not be shortlisted.




Regarding MAGNA recruitment process, please note that!

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â MAGNA will conduct its recruitment on the basis of need only.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â MAGNA commits to a fair and transparent recruitment procedure.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Only HR department will contact you during the recruitment process.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â MAGNA may keep data of your application for its pool of candidate and might propose to you another position than the one you applied for based on your qualification.




Only short-listed candidates whose application responds to the criteria will be contacted & local applicants from the same province are encouraged to apply and will be given priority.Â

title: Delivery and Service Director
description:
About Huawei Technologies Afghanistan Co, Ltd

Huawei Technologies Afghanistan Co, Ltd is a subsidiary of Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd., a global leader in information and communications technology (ICT) solutions. Established to serve the Afghan market, Huawei Technologies Afghanistan provides advanced ICT products and services, including telecommunications infrastructure, enterprise solutions, and digital power (Huaweiâ€™s Digital Power focuses on integrating digital and power electronics technologies to provide innovative solutions for renewable energy generation, energy storage, and efficient energy management to drive sustainability and carbon neutrality). The company plays a significant role in developing Afghanistanâ€™s digital ecosystem, partnering with local telecom operators, and enterprises to enhance connectivity, foster innovation, and drive digital transformation. Huawei Technologies Afghanistan focuses on building secure and efficient ICT systems, including mobile networks (2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G), data centers, and cloud computing solutions, tailored to meet the unique needs of the Afghan market. Its operations align with Huaweiâ€™s global vision of enabling digital inclusion and advancing technological progress.)

Job Summary

We are looking for a highly skilled Delivery and Service Director to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in telecom and ICT engineering, along with experience in finance control, internal control, and project group management. This leadership position requires fluency in both Chinese and English and a proven ability to oversee the delivery of services and projects across diverse teams and stakeholders.

Duties & Responsibilities

Oversee the entire lifecycle of delivery and service operations for our telecom and ICT projects.
Manage and lead internal project groups, ensuring timely and cost-effective project delivery.
Ensure compliance with finance control and internal control policies, maintaining financial integrity throughout the projects.
Collaborate with senior leadership to develop and implement operational strategies.
Drive improvements in service delivery processes and customer satisfaction.
Act as the primary point of contact for key clients and stakeholders, ensuring clear communication and alignment with business objectives.
Lead cross-functional teams, providing guidance and mentorship to junior managers and team members.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, technologies, and regulatory requirements.
Report on project status, financials, and any risks or issues to the executive team.

Job Requirements

Proven experience in a leadership role within the telecom and ICT industries.
Strong background in finance control, internal control, and project management.
Ability to communicate fluently in both Chinese and English (both written and spoken).
Engineering background in telecommunications or ICT, with a deep understanding of technical delivery and service operations.
Excellent interpersonal and leadership skills, with the ability to manage teams and coordinate across multiple departments.
Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, constantly evolving environment.
Preferred Qualifications:
Bachelor's or Masterâ€™s degree in Telecommunications, Engineering, Automation or a related field.
Experience with international project management or multi-country operations.
Certification in Project Management (e.g., PMP) is a plus.

Submission Guideline

title: Daily Wage/Enumerator (On & Off)
description:
About Islamic Relief Worldwide

Islamic Relief Worldwide (IRW) is an international, non-profitable, non-governmental humanitarian relief organization with its head quarter in Birmingham, UK. It enjoys consultative status with the Economic and Social Council of the United Nations and is a signatory to the Code of Conduct for International Red Cross and red Crescent Moments and NGOs in Disaster Relief. Islamic Relief has been working in Afghanistan for more than 23 years, providing emergency relief and implementing life-changing development projects for some of the most vulnerable people in the country. Islamic Relief set up our first Afghanistan office in 1999. Since then, IRA continued providing assistances in emergency relief, food security, livelihood, education, health, nutrition, shelter, orphan sponsorship, Ramadan and Qurbani programmes.

Job Summary

The Surveyor/distributor is responsible for the collection of information on assigned tasks by the Humanitarian department of IRW, conducting door-to-door assessment surveys for profiling communities and implementing the distribution interventions assigned by the Humanitarian department of IRW in the targeted locations.

Duties & Responsibilities

Â Regularly travel to targeted urban and rural areas across cities and districts of the assigned provinces, ensuring timely presence in hard-to-reach and underserved communities.
Conduct accurate, respectful, and timely household-level assessments and door-to-door surveys in close coordination with Community Development Councils (CDCs), village elders, and community representatives, to identify and register vulnerable households in line with approved program criteria.
Engage with community members in a culturally sensitive manner to help identify the most vulnerable groups, including female-headed households, persons with disabilities, elderly-headed households, internally displaced persons (IDPs), and returnees.
Actively support inclusive community engagement by developing practical approaches to reach vulnerable households in remote and rural locations, taking into account security, accessibility, and cultural norms.
Ensure that all selected beneficiaries strictly meet the eligibility criteria and that the selection process is transparent, fair, and free from favoritism or influence.
Accurately register beneficiary and community information and maintain an organized and up-to-date database, ensuring confidentiality and protection of personal data at all times.
Participate in required training, briefings, and refresher sessions related to assessment tools, protection principles, accountability to affected populations (AAP), and data quality.
Immediately report any challenges, risks, community feedback, or protection concerns encountered in the field to the supervisor or relevant team.
Adhere to organizational values, humanitarian principles, safeguarding policies, and local customs while representing the organization professionally in the field.
Perform any other duties assigned by management that support effective program implementation and community engagement.

Job Requirements

Qualification:

12 Grade, Diploma or bachelorâ€™s degree in social science or any other relevant field is preferable.

Experience:

Minimum of 1â€“2 years of relevant experience in data collection, surveys, assessments, or similar field-based work.

Required Skills:

Proven fast and accurate English typing skills with strong data entry experience, particularly using digital data collection tools.
Familiarity with electronic data collection platforms (e.g., KoboToolbox, ODK, CommCare, or similar) is an asset.
Good communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact respectfully with diverse communities.Â 




Submission Guideline

Interested and qualified national candidates shouldÂ submitÂ a cover letter explaining their motivation and an updated CV to the following link:

Daily Wage/Enumerator (On & Off) | Jobs.af




The closing date for accepting applications isÂ 20 January 2026




Please note that applications received after the closing date will not be considered, and only short-listed candidates will be called for written test.




Islamic Relief Worldwide â€“ AfghanistanÂ is committed to providing equal employment opportunities and encourages applications from all qualified candidates, including women and persons with disabilities.

title: RAN Back Office Engineer ( Huawei)
description:
About I Engineering Group

ieng Group provides EPC and O&M infrastructure services with a focus on the telecom and power industries. The Group's subsidiaries Eki.Struct (tower) and GreenPole (power), along with its affiliated asset management company CREI complement the functions provided by ieng.

Established in 2007, the Group is a leading provider of telecom infrastructure and managed services in Africa and Emerging Markets.




We have grown rapidly since our inception in 2007 and are now operational in 19 countries: Afghanistan, Algeria, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, DR Congo, Ethiopia, Ghana, Guinea, Kenya, KSA, Lebanon, Liberia, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, Philippines, South Sudan and Uganda.

Today, we maintain over 31,200+ sites for Africaâ€™s largest MNOs and all TowerCos.







Our visionÂ To become the leading Engineering Procurement and Construction (EPC) and Operation and Maintenance (O&M) contractor in global emerging markets.







ï»¿Our MissionÂ We provide EPC and O&M services to the telecom, renewable energy and construction industries in global emerging markets, seamlessly integrating our core competencies with our customersâ€™ businesses, so they benefit from competitive and comprehensive solutions.




Job Summary

ieng Afghanistan is seeking highly skilled Huawei experts for RAN to join our team. The ideal candidate must have extensive experience with Huawei networks and equipment. This role involves leading network swap, network planning, optimization, troubleshooting, and maintenance efforts to ensure the highest performance and reliability of network. Attractive package will be offered

Duties & Responsibilities

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Provide Analysis and monitoring Network performance by Checking Key Quality Indicators (KQI's)

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Monitor and demarcating service degradation (Voice and Data) by checking performance of the network nodes

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Knowledge of performance counters of RAN and Core KPIâ€™s to make sure that all necessary counters are activated for daily, weekly, monthly and critical outages.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Using Big Data analytics to provide trend analysis for KQI/KPI and provide suggestions and solution on performance improvement

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Customer proactive support using signaling call flows and big data analytics to improve Customer experience.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Investigate and analyze individual User complaints for " CS and PS" services, international link's (link utilization, call performance)

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Mapping between KPI's & KQI's that's related to worst cell/Site/Node analysis to assist relevant team in improving network performance.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Detect value added cases by analyzing which KPI affect services.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Reviewing and making guidelines for network performance and people management.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Managing day-to-day Network KPIs and performed required analysis to improve the service delivery

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Review of various reports (Site outage report, KPI reports, Daily CR report, Pending Outage Reports).

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Checking and reviewing of the KPIs and SLA of the TTâ€™s created by Monitoring team.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Technical review of the work orders change request which are impacting the NOC monitoring.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Providing post incident report and Root cause analysis for Major and Critical Incidents and User complaints.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Expert knowledge of U2020, BSC, RNC, 2G, 3G, LTE/5G technologies and Huawei RAN solutions.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Empower local RAN team to do complex task and train them daily, weekly and monthly basis.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Proven experience in leading large-scale RAN projects and optimization initiatives.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Network deployment and implementation to oversee installation and configuration of RAN components and ensure equipment is step according design and standards.

Â·Â Â Â Â Capacity Management to assess network traffic and make sure that each interface has enough capacity to handle peak hours traffic.

Â·Â Â Â Â Trouble shooting and Problem Resolution to analyze problem, degradation and other RAN KPIs.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Use available or third partiesâ€™ or specialized software tools for network analysis and trouble shooting.

Â Â·Â Â Â Â Technology Upgrades and Updates, Ability to migrate from vendor to Vendor and advance wireless technology.

Â 

OH&S/QMS Role and Responsibilities:

Â 

Reports any hazards or risks in addition to Accidents/Incident to QHSE department.
Be aware of and complies to i engineeringâ€™s IMS Policy.
Abides by i engineeringâ€™s Local Legal and Client Requirements.
Attends and engages in IMS Awareness Sessions.
Ensures that all IMS procedures are regularly followed and raises the issue when they are not




Job Requirements

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Minimum 5 years of experience.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â BSc. in /Electrical/IT, Telecom Engineering/Computer EngineeringÂ 

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Excellent presentation skills.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Must have strong telecom skills and knowledge of common programs such as Microsoft Office.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Ability to work under pressure.

ï»¿ï»¿ï»¿ï»¿Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and make data-driven decisions.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Excellent communication, presentation, and client-facing abilities.

About Ministry of Public Health

The Ministry of Public Health (MoPH) is tasked with a critical mandate; to deliver and promote sustainable and accessible health care services to the people of Afghanistan. Social and economic advancement can only be realized in a thriving and healthy society. The success of the MoPH is heavily driven in its ability to plan and use allocated resources effectively. Effective financial management is therefore critical for sustainable development and is the primary tool that translates the MoPH development strategies into noticeable outcomes or service delivery. Good governance and accountability relies on transparent management of the MoPH budget. Therefore, ineffective financial management undermines the effectiveness and efficiency of development interventions and hinders the countryâ€™s progress towards improved and sustainable health care. MoPH finance directorate is going through a reform process and after reviewing the structure of finance directorates of other line ministries such as MRRD, MoE and MAIL, has proposed a new and standard structure that is approved by MoPH leadership, for this purpose MoPH needs a qualified staff as head of coordination and reporting unite, to take the responsibility of overall coordination and financial reporting of MoPH.

title: Branch Manager
description:
About AsrePoya Inc

-

Job Summary

The Branch Manager is responsible for leading and managing all branch operations to ensure efficiency, profitability, and customer satisfaction. This role oversees staff performance, drives business growth, and maintains compliance with company policies and industry regulations. The Branch Manager serves as the primary representative of the branch, fostering strong client relationships, implementing strategic initiatives, and ensuring smooth day-to-day operations. Success in this position requires strong leadership, financial management skills, and the ability to deliver exceptional service while achieving business objectives.

Duties & Responsibilities

Leadership & Team Management

Supervise, mentor, and motivate branch staff to achieve performance targets.
Conduct regular training and performance evaluations.
Foster a positive, customer-focused work environment.

Business Development

Develop and implement strategies to increase branch sales and market share.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, partners, and the local community.
Identify new business opportunities and expand customer base.

Operations & Compliance

Ensure smooth day-to-day operations of the branch.
Monitor adherence to company policies, regulatory requirements, and industry standards.
Oversee cash management, security, and audit processes.

Financial Management

Prepare and manage branch budgets, forecasts, and financial reports.
Track revenue, expenses, and profitability.
Implement cost-control measures while maximizing efficiency.

Customer Service

Guarantee high-quality service delivery and customer satisfaction.
Resolve escalated customer issues promptly and effectively.
Promote customer loyalty through personalized service.




Job Requirements

Education: Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science (priority will be given to candidates holding a Masterâ€™s degree).

Languages: Fluency in Dari, Pashto, and English.

Technical Skills: Strong knowledge of computer science concepts and tools.

Managerial Skills: Effective planning, decision-making, and resource management abilities.

Personal Attributes: Leadership qualities, teamwork spirit, and strong communication skills with clients and colleagues.




Note : Applicants holding a Masterâ€™s degree will receive extra points during the evaluation process.Â 







Submission Guideline

Candidates must submit an updated CV/resume along with a cover letter highlighting relevant experience and skills.

Applications should be sent via email to the designated HR address.

All applications must be received before the closing date specified in the job announcement. Late submissions will not be considered.

company: Inam Bahar Dairy and Beverages Production Company
description:
About Inam Bahar Dairy and Beverages Production Company

We take pride in ourselves on using only the best quality ingredients in our products. Our team of professional employees and food nutritionists ensure that only the best products are delivered to your table. All Inam bahar products are produced in accordance with the internationally recognized HACCP and ISO 9001 standards. Inam Bahar Dairy and Beverages Production Company is one of the leading manufacturers and distributors of dairy products, long life UHT milk,Â juicesÂ &Â Cream.

Job Summary

We are seeking a versatile and skilled professional to fill the dual role of Designer and IT Technician. This unique position combines creative design expertise with technical IT support to ensure seamless operations across both creative and technical domains. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating visually appealing designs while also maintaining and troubleshooting IT systems to support the organizationâ€™s goals.

Duties & Responsibilities

Develop creative designs for digital and print media, including graphics, layouts, logos, and marketing materials.
Collaborate with teams to conceptualize and execute design projects that align with brand guidelines.

title: Java Spring Boot Developer
description:
About AfghanPAY Services Company

Afghan Pay Services Company was established in 2020 with registration number 144980 and license number 70362 is registered in the Ministry of Industry and Trade. AfghanPAY started its activities in the field of electronic payment, e-up up, tickets booking and distribution channel for telecommunication companies to create a unique system and significant market presence in Afghanistan from different angles. Developed different in terms of supplying different telecommunication product lines. Moreover, AfghanPAY contracted FTTH (fiber to the home) project in partnership with Afghan Telecom Company (AFTEL) with the intention of providing high-speed internet & digital services to residential & business areas in every corner of the country to serve its beloved nation with contemporary technology and gain significant market presence in the country. Afghan Pay with registration number 144980 and license number 70362 is registered in the Ministry of Industry and Trade. Afghan Pay management team has more than 13 years of experience in the field of sales and distribution of telecom sectors products in the market. Afghan Pay is committed to enter into market with a strong trading system B2B and B2C platform according to national and international norms with dedicated team, we research market goals to find and implement them. The Afghan pay team has more than 12 years of experience in various business fields. We want to develop new business networks such as KIOSK, POS Terminals and API so that we can expand our coverage and give customers access to electronic products anytime, anywhere. To make sure that all over the country covered. Afghan Pay intends to increase its products in every corner of the country to make your dreams come true. Click on the button on your phone to book your travel ticket and pay electronically without any risk or worry. We know that anyone who wants to pay their electricity bill without going to a bank or Brishna company, Afghan pay invested for your satisfactions and wants to make sure all your needs are available on your phone. Todayâ€™s technological revolution has triggered our attention to revolutionize the lifestyle of our nation through investing in the realm of technology & digitalization which is possible by launching FTTH (Fiber to the home) cutting edge technology to provide our people in every corner & counter with a high-speed bandwidth internet that trigger a high standard living style facilities though out Afghanistan.

Job Summary

The Java Spring Boot Developer is responsible for designing, developing, testing, deploying, and maintaining secure, scalable, and high-performance backend applications. The role involves building RESTful services, integrating databases and third-party systems, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver reliable software solutions aligned with business requirements.




Duties & Responsibilities

1. Backend Application Development

Design, develop, and maintain backend applications using Java and Spring Boot
Build and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices
Implement business logic, data processing, and system integrations
Ensure application performance, scalability, and security

2. API & Integration Development

Integrate applications with internal systems and external third-party APIs
Define and implement API contracts and data models
Ensure secure data exchange and proper error handling
Collaborate with frontend and other backend teams for seamless integration

3. Database Management

Design and manage databases using Relational Databases (RDBMS) such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle
Write optimized SQL queries and manage database transactions
Ensure data integrity, consistency, and performance

4. Software Quality Assurance

Write unit, integration, and functional tests
Debug and resolve application issues related to performance, security, and stability
Participate in code reviews and ensure compliance with coding standards
Follow best practices for clean, maintainable, and testable code

Â 

5. Support, Maintenance & Documentation

Provide ongoing support and maintenance for existing systems
Implement enhancements, bug fixes, and version upgrades
Prepare and maintain technical documentation and system designs
Ensure compliance with internal policies, security standards, and regulatory requirements

Job Requirements

Education

Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
Equivalent professional experience may be considered in place of formal education

a)Â Â Â Â Â Experience & Technical Skills

Proven experience as a Java Developer
Strong hands-on experience with Spring Boot and Spring ecosystem
Experience developing RESTful APIs
Strong knowledge of RDBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, etc.)
Familiarity with ORM frameworks such as JPA / Hibernate
Experience with Git or other version control systems
Understanding of application security and performance optimization

Â 

a)Â Â Â Â Â Preferred Skills

Experience with microservices architecture
Familiarity with Docker and containerization
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines
Experience with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka)

Â 

Soft Skills

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Good communication and teamwork abilities
Ability to manage tasks effectively and meet deadlines
Attention to detail and commitment to quality

Submission Guideline

AfghanPAY services company adapts quality circles of youngsters who have expertise & potential in the area of interest within the domain of business lines adapted by AfghanPAY. We require our potential candidates to submit their cover letter+ CVs to hr@afghan-pay.com. Please write your vacancy number (AFP-TOPUP2026-003 & field of expertise) in the subject line of your Email. We are thinking about our nationâ€™s future & fostering a culture of excellence & welcoming those who share our vision.Â 

Please note: only short-listed candidates are contacted.Â

title: Accountant
description:
About PARSA Technologies

PARSA in the local Afghanistan Market is one of the trusted partners in domains of web application development, mobile application development, value-added services, HR MIS, Finance Management System, SMS Platform, and e-commerce. We are glad to demonstrate through our work that we have the capabilities, people, processes, technology, and the desire to be the strategic technology partner of choice for many Afghan entities, including government departments, the private sector, and non-governmental

organizations (NGOs).

PARSAâ€™s primary objective is to develop an environment of fairness, honesty, integrity, and courtesy towards our clients, employees, vendors, and society at large. We are committed to our customers & partners and have a passion for technology.

Job Summary

PARSA Technology is hiring an Accountant.

Duties & Responsibilities

1. Accounting and Operational Management

Record, validate, and post daily financial transactions in line with accrual accounting and approved client policies.
Maintain Customer and Walking Customer accounts, ensuring correct handling of sales, receipts, credits, and outstanding balances.
Manage Vendor accounts and contracts, including commercial invoices, bills, bill of lading records, and vendor payments.
Monitor inventory movements across warehouses, ensuring accurate linkage between purchases, sales, production, and expenses.
Track shipments and logistics documents (e.g. bills of lading) and ensure consistency with related financial postings.

2. Financial Reporting and Controls Â·

Ensure timely preparation and submission of monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports.
Monitor pending transactions, customer and vendor ageing, and outstanding balances; follow up and resolve exceptions.
Provide client management with structured financial summaries and system-generated reports to support operational and business decisions.

V. Competencies and Critical Success Factors

Functional Competencies

Knowledge Management and Learning

Shares knowledge and experience;
Actively works towards continuing personal learning and development and applies newly acquired skills.

Development and Operational Effectiveness

Strong communication skills.
Strong Pashto, Dari and English writing and speaking skills.
Experience of working with financial systems
Computer skills

Leadership and Self-Management

Focuses on result for the client and responds positively to feedback;
Consistently approaches work with energy and a positive, constructive attitude.
Demonstrates openness to change and ability to manage complexity.
Ability to establish good working relations with a range of stakeholders.

Job Requirements

Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Finance, or related field.
Minimum 2â€“3 years of relevant accounting experience.
Willingness to be trained and certified on the Specific Accountant Application.

Submission Guideline

Interested individual submit their Personal CV indicating all experience from similar jobs, as well as the contact details (email and telephone number) of the Candidate to hr@parsa.technology

Note: Write the position title in the subject lineÂ of your email.

For any further information, you can contact +93728979703

title: Software Developer Intern (Full Stack/Mobile)
description:
About Quick Prime

Quick Prime Logistics is a trusted service provider in Afghanistan, delivering reliable logistics solutions for businesses and individuals. Alongside our core logistics services, we offer complete technology solutionsâ€”including web development, mobile app development, and custom softwareâ€”to help organizations modernize operations, improve efficiency, and grow with confidence. From planning and design to development, deployment, and support, Quick Prime combines practical industry experience with modern technology to deliver secure, scalable, and user-friendly systems.

Job Summary

Quick Prime Logistics is hiring Intern Developers to join our team in Afghanistan. This internship is designed for students, recent graduates, and self-learners who want practical, real-project experience with guidance from experienced developers.

No previous professional experience is required. If you have foundational knowledge and a strong willingness to learn, you are encouraged to apply.




As an Intern Developer, you will contribute to real software products and internal tools. You may work in one or more areas such as web development, mobile development, or general software engineering, depending on your interests and team needs.

Duties & Responsibilities



Contribute to building and improving software features under mentorship
Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
Assist with debugging, testing, and performance improvements
Participate in code reviews and learn development best practices
Work with the team to understand requirements and deliver tasks on time
Maintain documentation for features, fixes, and technical notes
Collaborate with designers, developers, and product stakeholders



Job Requirements

Skills and Qualifications (Preferred)
Programming & Computer Science
Understanding of programming concepts such as OOP, data structures, and algorithms
Strong problem-solving and logical thinking
Familiarity with software development lifecycle and coding standards
Web Development (if applying for web/full-stack track)
HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Familiarity with modern front-end development practices (component-based UI, responsive design)
Experience or exposure to frameworks such as React
Understanding of back-end development concepts (APIs, authentication, server-side logic)
Exposure to Node.js, Django, Laravel, or similar frameworks
Mobile Development (if applying for mobile track)
Understanding of mobile app development workflows
Exposure to Flutter, React Native, or native Android/iOS development
Familiarity with app navigation, UI layouts, and integrating APIs
Databases & Data Handling
Understanding of relational databases and querying
Experience or exposure to SQL, MySQL, or PostgreSQL
Familiarity with data modeling concepts and validation
Tools & Professional Practices
Version control using Git and GitHub
Familiarity with issue tracking and task management tools (Jira, Trello, GitHub Issues, etc.)
Ability to read documentation and learn new technologies independently
Clear communication, teamwork, and time management
Quality & Delivery
Understanding of testing concepts (unit testing, integration testing)
Attention to detail and ability to follow requirements
Interest in writing secure, reliable, and scalable code










Note

If you donâ€™t meet every preferred skill listed above, we still encourage you to apply. We value motivation, learning ability, and a strong work ethic.










What You Will Gain
Hands-on experience with real projects and professional workflows
Mentorship and technical growth through reviews and collaboration
Stronger portfolio and CV through practical contributions
Experience working in a team environment with modern tools and processes




Submission Guideline

Interested applicants are requested to send their CV to safaryar.technologies@gmail.com

and include jawad.safaryar@gmail.com

in CC.

Please mention the position you are applying for in the email subject line.

title: Senior iOS Application Developer
description:
About Kabul Space Logistic & Technology Services

Welcome to KabulSpace, a premierÂ software development and IT solutionsÂ company headquartered in Kabul, Afghanistan. We specialize in creating tailored digital applications, offering end-to-end services from custom software design to system integration and consulting.

Our expertise extends to enterprise networking and mission-critical network infrastructure, ensuring reliable support and scalability for businesses. With a skilled and passionate team, we deliver innovative, efficient, and customer-focused solutions that empower organizations, whether private enterprises or non-governmental entities, to thrive in a dynamic technological landscape. Letâ€™s shape the future together!

Job Summary

Job Summary:

As a senior iOS application developer at the Kabulspace, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex iOS applications. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet our clientsâ€™ needs and enhance user experience.







Duties & Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities:

iOS App Development:
Develop and maintain iOS applications using Swift and/or Objective-C.
Ensure seamless integration of UI/UX designs within the iOS ecosystem (UIKit, SwiftUI).
Real-Time Communication:
Work with real-time communication messaging protocols and libraries.
Integrate third-party libraries and services for real-time messaging.
API & Data Handling:
Understand and consume RESTful APIs; handle JSON/XML data.
Utilize encryption protocols for secure message delivery.
Code Analysis & Debugging:
Study, analyze, and understand complex software application code in Swift/Objective-C.
Debug and optimize existing iOS applications, ensuring high performance and productivity.
Database & Backend Integration:
Work with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, MariaDB, or MySQL.
Have basic familiarity with NoSQL (e.g., Firebase, MongoDB) for scalable backend solutions.
Understand distributed key-value stores (e.g., Mnesia or relevant iOS-compatible alternatives).
Version Control & Collaboration:
Utilize Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to define project requirements and specifications.
Provide feedback through code reviews and mentor junior developers.
Testing & Quality Assurance:
Participate in software testing processes (unit testing, automated functional testing, integration testing).
Ensure code quality and maintain best practices and coding standards.
Documentation & Reporting:
Write, revise, and maintain software technical documentation, operational documentation, and user guides.
Provide regular task status updates, highlight challenges, and submit reports to management as per SLA.
Additional Responsibilities:
Perform any other duties related to the role as assigned by management.
Training and support for junior developers.



Job Requirements

Required Qualifications:

Education:
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information System, or a related field.
Experience:
5+ years of professional experience in mobile application development (iOS preferred).
Proven proficiency with iOS development in Swift and/or Objective-C.
Experience with Xcode, Cocoa Touch frameworks, and iOS development best practices.
Technical Expertise:
Knowledge of end-to-end encryption frameworks and protocols.
Experience with real-time communication protocols.
Familiarity with integrating third-party libraries for real-time messaging.
Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MariaDB, MySQL) and distributed DBMS (Mnesia or similar).
Understanding of NoSQL databases (e.g., Firebase, MongoDB) for scalable backend integration.
Proficiency in RESTful APIs and JSON/XML data handling.

Preferred Qualifications (Pulse Points):

Containerization & DevOps:
Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices.
Encryption:
Familiarity with data encryption for secure communication and storage within iOS applications.






Submission Guideline

Applicants are required to mention the Job Title and Vacancy # in the subject line of their email. Please attach your updated CV and a cover letter and send them toÂ hr@kabulspace.af, with a copy (CC) toÂ kabulspace2025@gmail.com. The application deadline is 10-Aug-2025, so ensure your submission is sent before this date.

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview and a demo session. We look forward to receiving your applications.

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer (Permanent Position)
description:
About Peshtaz Academy

Linkshops is a fast-growing multi-vendor marketplace platform delivering modern solutions across e-commerce, delivery, and on-demand services. Our products include high-performance Android, iOS, and web applications, built to scale and serve thousands of users. We are expanding our technical team and are looking for a highly skilled Full-Stack Developer who is passionate about building reliable, scalable, and user-focused digital products.

Job Summary

We are seeking a Professional Full-Stack Developer to join our core development team on a permanent basis. You will play a critical role in designing, developing, maintaining, and optimizing our Linkshops applications across web and mobile platforms. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and takes ownership of products from concept to deployment.

Duties & Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain scalable full-stack applications for web and mobile
Work with React and Flutter to build modern, high-performance user interfaces
Develop and maintain backend services using Laravel
Manage databases using MySQL and Firebase
Integrate RESTful APIs, third-party services, and internal systems
Implement and maintain payment gateway integrations
Work with Google Maps APIs for location-based services
Build, test, and deploy applications for Android and iOS
Ensure application security, performance optimization, and code quality
Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and QA teams
Participate in architecture decisions and technical planning




Job Requirements

Required Skills & Qualifications
Proven experience as a Full-Stack Developer
Strong expertise in:
React
Flutter
Laravel
Firebase
MySQL
Experience with Android and iOS app development
Solid knowledge of Google APIs, especially Google Maps
Hands-on experience integrating payment gateways
Strong understanding of APIs, authentication, and data security
Clean coding practices and experience with version control (Git)
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong problem-solving and communication skills
Nice to Have
Experience with large-scale marketplace or delivery platforms
DevOps or cloud deployment experience
Performance optimization and scalability experience
Prior work on multi-vendor or fintech applications
What We Offer
Permanent, long-term position
Competitive salary based on experience
Opportunity to work on a large, real-world production platform
Flexible working environment (remote/hybrid)
Professional growth and leadership opportunities
A collaborative, innovative, and respectful team culture
Why Join Linkshops?

At Linkshops, you wonâ€™t just write code â€” youâ€™ll help shape a platform used by real businesses and customers every day. If you are a motivated, skilled developer looking for stability, impact, and long-term growth, we would love to hear from you.




Submission Guideline

Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their applications as soon as possible. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until the position is filled. Early submission is highly recommended.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
About Baheer Group (BG)

Baheer Group (BG) is a prominent manufacturer and provider of high-quality papers and paper products, offering premium solutions in Papers, Packaging, Printing, Mines & Energy, and supplying state-of-the-art Printing Machineries. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our diversified portfolio, which caters to both domestic and international markets. Backed by an extensive Group of Companies, BG consistently surpasses industry standards, specializing in customized products tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.

Job Summary

We are seeking an experienced Full stack developer to join our team. This role is suited for a developer who has worked on production systems, understands modern development workflows, and can contribute effectively to both backend and frontend development in a professional environment.

The ideal candidate is comfortable working with established systems, writing high-quality code, and collaborating with other engineers to deliver reliable and scalable software solutions.

Duties & Responsibilities

Design, develop, and maintain web applications using Laravel on the backend and React (TypeScript, React Query) on the frontend
Build and maintain clean, scalable, and maintainable backend services and APIs
Develop user-facing features using modern frontend practices
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions
Review code, provide constructive feedback, and help maintain high engineering standards
Optimize application performance, database queries, and system reliability
Work with Git and GitHub in a collaborative, team-based workflow
Use Docker for development, testing, and deployment environments
Participate in system improvements, refactoring, and technical decision-making
Contribute to documentation and technical knowledge sharing

Job Requirements

Strong professional experience with Laravel (PHP) in production environments
Solid experience with React.js, TypeScript and modern JavaScript development
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

title: Customer Service Agent - English Translator.
description:
About Speenkai

Speenkai is Afghanistan's first and leading BPO (Business Process Outsourcing) service company, specializing in providing comprehensive administrative and technical support to Afghan-owned companies abroad. Our mission is to empower Afghan entrepreneurs and businesses operating internationally by offering high-quality, reliable support services from our base in Afghanistan. With a team of skilled professionals, we help Afghan companies streamline their operations, enhance efficiency, and achieve success.

Job Summary

Night-Shift Job




Are you a motivated, detail-oriented professional fluent in English, and ready to grow in a dynamic environment? Speenkai, Afghanistan's first BPO service company, andÂ Bay Master Appliance Services LLCÂ are looking to hire experienced individuals to join ourÂ full-time night shift teamÂ asÂ Dispatchers/Customer Service Representatives.

In this role, you will take inbound calls, set appointments for customers, and dispatch technicians efficiently. The ideal candidate will take charge of daily operations, including planning, scheduling, and managing the tech force.




PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU ARE NOT FLUENT IN ENGLISHÂ to save yourself time.







If you have strong communication skills, thrive under pressure, and are passionate about delivering exceptional support, we want to hear from you!

Duties & Responsibilities

Duties & Responsibilities

1.Â Â Receive incoming calls from clients and setup service appointments.

2.Â Â Receive incoming calls from technicians throughout the shift.

3.Â Â Keep track of daily schedule and job status throughout work schedule.

4.Â Â Respond to open email requests and inquiries via email

5.Â Â Ability to enter tickets into the CRMÂ 




Job Requirements

Job Requirements

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Fluent in English and must possess excellent verbal and written skills.

â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Motivated self-starter

â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Office work experience

â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Ability to multitask in fast paced environment is crucial.

â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Capable of typing 45+ words per minute necessary

â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Customer Service skills and Conflict Resolution skills.

â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Telemarketing experience is a plus

â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Microsoft Office Products

title: Operation Specialist
description:
About COMSIS SOLUTIONS LLC

About Us




COMSIS Solutions is a U.S.-based company located in Alexandria, Virginia. Since 2014, we have been providing advanced technology, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, and logistics solutions. We work closely with U.S. Government agencies and ensure all our projects comply fully with FAR/DFARS regulations.




Our focus is on quality, compliance, on-time delivery, and transparency. COMSIS offers a professional and collaborative work environment that values integrity, teamwork, and growth. We provide excellent opportunities for learning, career development, and innovation.

Job Summary

We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Operation Manager to oversee and coordinate the daily operations of the company. The ideal candidate will ensure efficiency across all departments, maintain smooth workflows, and support the companyâ€™s strategic goals.




This role requires strong leadership, decision-making, and communication skills. The Operation Specialist will work closely with department head (Operations & Finance Manager) to identify challenges, implement solutions, and improve overall performance.The position is remote, with occasional coordination with the U.S. office and field teams.

Duties & Responsibilities

Oversee and manage the companyâ€™s day-to-day operational activities.

Coordinate between different departments to ensure smooth workflow and communication.

Develop and implement operational policies and procedures to improve efficiency.

Supervise project progress and ensure tasks are completed on time and within scope.

Support procurement, logistics, and administrative functions when required.

Prepare regular reports on performance, risks, and improvement areas.

Ensure compliance with internal company standards and U.S. Government requirements.

Collaborate with management to align operations with the companyâ€™s strategic objectives.

Lead, motivate, and support team members to achieve individual and collective goals.

Job Requirements

Bachelorâ€™s degree in IT or Business Administration, Management, or a related field.

Minimum 3â€“5 years of experience in operations, management, or customer support.

Strong leadership, communication, and organizational skills.

Excellent command of the English language (both written and spoken).

Proven ability to manage teams and multiple projects simultaneously.

High problem-solving ability and attention to detail.

Proficiency in Microsoft Office and familiarity with business productivity tools.

Strong sense of responsibility, punctuality, and commitment to quality.

Ability to work independently with minimal supervision

title: Procurement & Operations Specialist (Remote)
description:
About COMSIS SOLUTIONS LLC

About Us




COMSIS Solutions is a U.S.-based company located in Alexandria, Virginia. Since 2014, we have been providing advanced technology, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, and logistics solutions. We work with U.S. Government agencies and deliver all our projects in full compliance with FAR/DFARS regulations. Our focus is on quality, compliance, on-time delivery, and transparency. COMSIS offers a professional and collaborative work environment with strong opportunities for growth and learning.

Job Summary

We are seeking a highly motivated and independent Procurement & Operations Specialist to manage th e end-to-end procurement process for cur company. This role involves sourcing, negotiating, purchasing. vendor management, and resolving issues as they arise. You will work remotely and independently, often on-demand, to support different contracts and global supply chain need.

Duties & Responsibilities

Handle the complete procurement lifecycle from sourcing to purchasing.

Negotiate pricing, terms, and lead times with vendors and supplier.

Request and collect quotations from vendors via phone and email.

Place purchase orders and track deliveries.

Prepare and manage invoices, documentation, and compliance paperwork.

Resolve issues with vendors, logistics, or product availability.

Ensure timely procurement based on project deadlines.

Perform multitasking and versatile duties to support operations as needed.

Communicate directly with the management team regarding procurement status.

Maintain organized records of purchases, contracts, and supplier communications.

Job Requirements

Proven experience in procurement, purchasing, or vendor management.

Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.

Ability to negotiate effectively and close deals.

Must be highly independent, proactive, and able to work without supervision.

Flexible availability (not fixed to standard 9-5 hours).

Reliable laptop/computer and stable high-speed internet connection.

Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.

Fast learner with a problem-solving mindset.

Comfortable with remote work and taking full responsibility for tasks.

Fluent in English.

Knowledge and skills in IT to work with digital systems and toolsz

title: Backend Developer (PHP / Node.js)
company: TecTors Technology and Software Hous Co
description:
About TecTors Technology and Software Hous Co

TecTors Technology and Software House is a professional technology company based in Kabul, Afghanistan, providing complete digital and software solutions for businesses.

Our services include:

Development of business databases and commercial websites
Domain registration and web hosting
cPanel training and setup
Creation of official business emails
UI/UX design and digital branding

At TecTors, we empower businesses to grow through modern, secure, and reliable technology solutions.

Job Summary

TecTors Technology and Software House is looking for a skilled and motivated Backend Developer (PHP / Node.js) to join our growing technology team.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and optimizing backend systems, building APIs, and integrating databases for modern web applications.

This is a long-term position based in Kabul, offering the opportunity to work on innovative digital solutions for businesses.

Duties & Responsibilities

Develop, test, and maintain backend applications using PHP (Laravel) or Node.js (Express.js / Nest.js)
Build and integrate APIs with frontend and third-party systems
Design and optimize databases for business applications
Ensure code quality, security, and performance
Collaborate closely with UI/UX designers and frontend developers
Troubleshoot and resolve backend issues

Job Requirements

Proven experience in PHP (Laravel) or Node.js development
Familiarity with MySQL, MongoDB, or other databases
Knowledge of RESTful API design and integration
Understanding of frontend-backend collaboration
Problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Minimum 1â€“2 years of professional experience
Strong communication skills in English

Submission Guideline

Interested candidates should submit their CV and portfolio to info@tectors.com with the subject line: Backend Developer â€“ TecTors.

Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

For any questions regarding the position, contact via WhatsApp: +93 70 449 5743 (11:00 â€“ 15:00 Kabul time)

title: UI/UX Designer
company: TecTors Technology and Software Hous Co
description:
About TecTors Technology and Software Hous Co

TecTors Technology and Software House is a Kabul-based technology company specializing in creating innovative digital solutions for businesses.

Our services include:

Developing commercial websites
Creating and managing business databases
Domain registration and web hosting
Setting up official company emails
Training on cPanel and server management

At TecTors, we focus on delivering high-quality, user-friendly, and transformative solutions to help our clients grow their digital presence.

Job Summary

TecTors Technology and Software House is seeking a creative UI/UX & Graphic Designer to join our team in Kabul.

The ideal candidate will design user-friendly interfaces, engaging visuals, and compelling graphics for websites and applications.

This is a long-term position offering opportunities to work on innovative digital projects and grow professionally in a dynamic technology environment.

Duties & Responsibilities

Design and optimize user interfaces (UI) and user experiences (UX) for web applications, commercial websites, and database management systems.
Create wireframes, prototypes, mockups, and interactive designs for digital products.
Collaborate with Backend and Frontend developers to ensure seamless integration of design and functionality.
Conduct user research, usability testing, and feedback analysis to improve design decisions.
Develop responsive, accessible, and visually appealing interfaces across devices.
Ensure consistency with design systems, brand guidelines, and UI standards.
Stay updated on latest UI/UX trends, tools, and best practices, especially for web and database applications.
Assist in designing dashboards, forms, and data visualization components for internal and client systems.
Optimize user workflows and navigation for efficiency and clarity.




Job Requirements

Bachelorâ€™s degree in Graphic Design, UI/UX Design, Multimedia, Computer Science, or related field.
Minimum 1â€“3 years of professional experience in UI/UX design for web applications, commercial websites, or database systems.
Strong portfolio demonstrating UI/UX projects, interactive designs, and visual graphics.
Proficiency in design tools: Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator.
Experience with wireframing, prototyping, mockups, and user flows.
Understanding of user-centered design principles, usability, and accessibility standards.
Ability to collaborate with developers and translate requirements into functional design.
Knowledge of responsive design and cross-browser/device compatibility.
Strong visual design, typography, and color theory skills.
Excellent communication, problem-solving, and creative thinking skills.




Submission Guideline

Interested candidates should submit their CV and portfolio to info@tectors.com For any questions regarding this position, candidates can also contact us via WhatsApp: +93 70 449 5743 (11:00 â€“ 15:00 Kabul time).

with the subject line: UI/UX & Graphic Designer â€“ TecTors

Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Note: Portfolio should include UI/UX projects, website designs, and graphic design work to demonstrate relevant skills.
